channel.title: Adding custom items
channel.description:
Well i finally decided that i want to add some custom items to my source/client. I just need some help.
First im trying to add d claws. Do i just add the code to the class8.java or do i need to add it to somewhere else in the client folders.
I asked that question because when i spawn d claws it has the name and everything but no picture.
Help is much appreciated.

item.title: Adding custom items
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

wait, i need to do addmodel ####?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2009, 02:25:05 pm[/size][hr]and i succecfully added a black p hat, just need to make it a hat not a wep[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2009, 02:27:04 pm[/size][hr]i just dont think that my client sided code for d claws is correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding custom items
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

Did you type add model #### on your client? replace the # signs with the number of your model. By the way I just succesfully added d claws to my client like 5 minutes before I read this =P

Read full topic
